l:dependency.name: Jenkins HipChat Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: A Build status publisher that notifies channels on a HipChat server

l:dependency.name: HttpClient
l:dependency.l:description: The HttpClient component supports the client-side of RFC 1945 (HTTP/1.0) and RFC 2616 (HTTP/1.1) , several related specifications (RFC 2109 (Cookies) , RFC 2617 (HTTP Authentication) , etc.), and provides a framework by which new request types (methods) or HTTP extensions can be created easily.

l:dependency.name: Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.
